snippet: Swooping in on Goldman Sachs clients, JPMorgan Chase's Jamie Dimon said in an e-mail on Wednesday to his operating committee, is in poor taste.
abstract: Swooping in on Goldman Sachs clients, JPMorgan Chase's Jamie Dimon said in an e-mail on Wednesday to his operating committee, is in poor taste.

headline.main: Dimon Urges High Road in Goldman Controversy
